summary: This is a memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 12, 2019, regarding information passed from the Special Housing Unit. It notes that inmate Reyes was going to the WAB (likely a work assignment or program) and might not return, and that inmate Epstein would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

persons.name: Inmate Reyes
persons.context: Inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center who was going to the WAB and possibly not returning, as noted in the memorandum.

persons.name: Inmate Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein, an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, who would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit, as noted in the memorandum.

events.title: Information Passed from Special Housing Unit
events.description: On Friday, August 9, 2019, at approximately 1:50 p.m., information was passed regarding inmate Reyes going to the WAB and possibly not returning, and inmate Epstein needing a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The document is a memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center dated August 12, 2019.
It references information passed on August 9, 2019, regarding inmate Reyes possibly not returning from the WAB.
It notes that inmate Epstein would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.
The document is from shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, providing context about his status and housing arrangements in the days leading up to it.
